name: SoberSimon
description:
Sober Simon is about preventing your very drunk friends from making bad decisions on a night out! You play as Simon, who desperately have to run around either disabling various distraction or yelling at your friends to stay together.

 If you yell at them enough, you might get to know why they are acting out…

Move with arrow keys or left thumb stick
Yell: Z or joypad-X
Disable distraction: X or joypad A
